ValidationRule.description: Legacy support/success package products cannot be added to new business and upsell opportunities. Webdam Opps are exempted from this change.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name="System Administrator"), NOT( Opportunity.Platform__c = "Webdam" ), /* Excluding Webdam Opps */ ISNEW(), Quantity >0, OR( TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "Existing Business-Upsell" ), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Plus_Support_Package_US_Only, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Bronze_Support_Package_EMEA_Only, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Basic_Support_Package_US_Only, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Diamond_Support_Package, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Enterprise_Support_Package_US_Only, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Gold_Support_Package_EMEA_Only, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Premier_Support_Package, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Silver_Support_Package_EMEA_Only, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Platinum_Support_Plan, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Gold_Support_Plan, Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.Silver_Support_Plan ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Support/Success Package product cannot be added to New business or Upsell opportunities.
